text: Louis Leonard Hasley (November 3, 1906 - May 1986) was an American writer, poet, essayist, editor, and critic. He was also a professor of English at the University of Notre Dame from 1931 to 1973.http://archives.nd.edu/findaids/ead/xml/has.xml He was married to Lucile Hasley, who was also a writer. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America == References == Category:1906 births Category:1986 deaths Category:Writers from Indiana Category:American poets Category:American essayists Category:Academics from Indiana
